div.p: Expanded view of interval 6–5 Ma at ODP Site 1146. a Mg/Ca-derived mixed layer temperatures with (red scale) and without (black scale) correction for secular changes in Mg/Ca of seawater. b ∆δ 13C; c Planktic δ 13C. d Benthic δ 13C. e Planktic δ 18O. f Benthic δ 18O. Blue shading indicates intense transient cooling episodes associated with planktic δ 13C depletion and with planktic and benthic δ 18O enrichments (TG events). Light orange shading marks climate warming after 5.5 Ma. Age correlation points are indicated by crosses; 3 pt smooth: 3 pt moving mean
